For anyone thinking of downloading this torrent a 40minute TV episode at 720p is 1.1GB . A 2.5 hour movie which is only 0.65GB either uses magic compression which is 8 times better (over 4x as long and just over 1/2 the size!) or it's shit quality. If you're not wattching it on a HD screen it might look ok.

Yes it's a lower resolution because it's in cinema aspect ratio but if he's going to call it 720p anyway... 1280x720 is 720p, 1280x534 isn't. This would only help the filesize slightly - 0.68 MegaPixels per frame vs 0.92, you'd still need compression 5 times better than anything anyone else is using... and if it existed people would be using it)

Great seeding and quick download. But at such a low bitrate 720p does not make any sense at all. If you plan to play on an HD TV, resolution will be poor every time there is movement, and heavy pixelation is evident in many scenes. 
Sound is also mediocre, as it is off synch and only sampled at 24 KHz and 2 channels. A far cry from a 5.1 Dolby Digital or DTS.
So, download it only if you plan to watch it on your laptop.
